pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Complex UpSet Plots Using 'ggplot2' Components // UpSet plots are an improvement over Venn Diagram for set overlap visualizations. Striving to bring the best of the 'UpSetR' and 'ggplot2', this package offers a way to create complex overlap visualisations, using simple and familiar tools, i.e. geoms of 'ggplot2'. For introduction to UpSet concept, see Lex et al. (2014) doi:10.1109/TVCG.2014.2346248.
